message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with detecting hand actions from depth sequences, which is a problem in computer vision. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also addresses the issue of non-stationary camera motion, which falls under the sub-category of Robotics (cs.RO). The use of a discriminatively learned error-correcting component suggests that the paper may also belong to the sub-category of Machine Learning (cs.LG) or Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper deals with constructing an annotated dataset, which falls under the sub-category of Multimedia (cs.MM).
